# Justin Shenkarow

## Bio
Justin Shenkarow is an American actor, voice artist, and producer with over 30 years in the entertainment industry. He is a Stanford University graduate with an MBA and a former Chinese Government Scholar who studied in Shanghai.

## Notable Voice Acting Roles
- Harold Berman on "Hey Arnold!" (Nickelodeon, 1996-2004, 71 episodes) and Hey Arnold! The Jungle Movie (2017)
- Rhino on "Spidey and His Amazing Friends" (Disney Junior/Marvel, 2021-present, 45+ episodes)
- Izzy (Whatizit), the official mascot of the 1996 Atlanta Summer Olympics — the world's first CGI Olympic mascot
- Charlie Brown in "It's Spring Training, Charlie Brown!" (1992) and Peanuts (1996)
- Eddie Horton on "Lloyd in Space" (Disney, 40 episodes)
- Gelman and additional voices on "Recess" (Disney, 15 episodes)
- Michael Grunewald on "Life with Louie" (Fox, 36 episodes)
- Patch on "101 Dalmatians: The Series" (Disney)
- Player on "Where on Earth Is Carmen Sandiego?" (11 episodes)
- Eric on "W.I.T.C.H." (Disney)
- Jordan on "Batman: The Animated Series"
- Telemachus on "Hercules" (Disney)
- Daniel on "The Little Mermaid" (Disney)

## Notable On-Screen Roles
- Matthew Brock on "Picket Fences" (CBS, 1992-1996, 88 episodes) — Emmy and Golden Globe Award-winning series
- Simon Holmes on "Eerie, Indiana" (NBC, 1991-1992, 19 episodes) — cult classic, 100% on Rotten Tomatoes
- Kevin Driscoll on "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air"
- Matt on "Home Improvement"
- Iggy on "Z Nation"

## ADR / Additional Voice Work (Selected)
- Avatar (2009)
- Good Will Hunting (1997)
- Silver Linings Playbook (2012)
- Ice Age (2002)
- Bee Movie (2007)
- Shrek the Third (2007)
- Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
- The Mitchells vs. the Machines (2021)
- Deadpool (2016) and Deadpool 2 (2018)
- Scream (1996)

## Video Games
- L.A. Noire (2011) — Patrolman James Mitchell
- Ace Combat: Assault Horizon (2011)
- Lost Planet: Extreme Condition (2006)
- Gurumin: A Monstrous Adventure (2004)
- Shadow of Destiny (2001)

## Production and Business
- Co-founder of TZero Studios — an Emmy-winning animation and content studio
- Co-creator and executive producer of "Bronx Buds" — Emmy Award-winning animated series produced with New York Yankees Entertainment, streaming on Gotham Sports
- Founder of Shake That Fro Productions
- Executive Producer of "CBS Saturday Morning" (2021)
- Producer of multiple optioned properties including "Kleptocracy" and "FBI Case Files"

## Awards and Recognition
- Emmy Award — Best Ensemble Cast, Picket Fences
- Golden Globe Award — Best Ensemble Cast, Picket Fences
- Emmy Award — Bronx Buds
- Emmy Nomination — Bronx Buds

## Industry Leadership
- Served on the SAG-AFTRA National Board
- National Chairman of the SAG-AFTRA Young Performers Committee
- Advocated for child actor protections industry-wide

## Education
- Stanford University — MBA graduate
- Chinese Government Scholar — studied in Shanghai

## Current Projects
- Voicing Rhino on "Spidey and His Amazing Friends" (ongoing)
- Co-creating and producing "Bronx Buds" (ongoing)
- Developing "It's Your Fault" — comedy pilot (Creator/Star)
- Producing "Kleptocracy" — thriller series inspired by true FBI story
- Producing "ERT" — crime procedural series based on true FBI story
